TopicTitle: Edit the altitude at which stars start to show up?

Articles.Content:
Hello.

One thing has been bothering me since forever:

When ascending to space, the sky turns pitch black looong before you can see the stars. What can I edit to lower the altitude at which the stars show up?

In RSS this problem is absent - as the atmosphere fades out at much greater altitude then the one at which stars show up.

Does anyone know how to implement this in a stock game?

if you have Better Atmospheres installed the stars are being washed out by the reflected light of the planet. if its stock it's because you are not out of the atmosphere yet. it is thin enough so that the light from the sun doesnt give it color, but not thin enough that tje stars shine through.
There is no way to change this in the stock game and I am unaware of any mods that would do this either.
